verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] arrived in Singapore where he will meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump] has [V: arrived] [ARG4: in Singapore where he will meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
President Donald Trump has arrived in Singapore where he [V: will] meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .
President Donald Trump has arrived in Singapore [ARGM-LOC: where] [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARG1: with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
